description:
vnc/xvp_proxy.py defines consoleauth_topic to default to nova.consoleauth. However, consoleauth/__init__.py defaults to 'consoleauth'.

The 'consoleauth' value is more consistent with other services and with standards / documentation.
title: consoleauth_topic is inconsistently redefined as consoleauth and nova.consoleauth

comments.content:
vnc/xvp_proxy.py defines consoleauth_topic to default to nova.consoleauth. However, consoleauth/__init__.py defaults to 'consoleauth'.

The 'consoleauth' value is more consistent with other services and with standards / documentation.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ewindisch

comments.content: nova.consoleauth is part of a flags.DECLARE which just tells it to load the flag from that file, it doesn't define it to a new value.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vishvananda
